name: Pogo Doc
description:
A game where you have to pogo on the corona virus and avoid it to get cures tor corona virus for you patients!

A and D on keyboard and left stick on controler for movement.

S on keyboard and left stick down on controler to jump down.

space on keyboard and B on controler for jump.

W on keyboard and Y on controler for pogoing while in air

note: only use chrome and also it says the page is unresponsive but wait it through because after around a 1min it will work and the game can be played.

I used godot 4.0 but it seems that there are still bugs with the stable release I did everything video and itch told me to do.
